column4: my windows seem to have lost the top bar with the window controls in them. Can anyone tell me how to get them back?
when the windows decoration dissapears it is usually due to compiz
how do I turn it off?
there is no button to turn them off, just enable.
there should be a "no effects" button or the like
try restarting your X server with Ctrl+Alt+Backspace and you will find out
if you open up cgonf-editor and go to /desktop/gnome/applications/window_manager/default, what does it say?
it says metacity now. I think it change back when I saved my sessions and logged out/back in
